dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, B, so I was looking at this, uh, fascinating list of the wealthiest individuals in South Korea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, B, so I was looking at this, uh, fascinating list of the wealthiest individuals in South Korea.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? That's always interesting. What's the, like, big picture?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? That's always interesting. What's the, like, big picture?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, no huge surprises at the top. Lee Kun-hee, still number one, from Samsung, obviously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, no huge surprises at the top. Lee Kun-hee, still number one, from Samsung, obviously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee $17.3 B 78 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I kinda figured Samsung would be dominant. How many of the top ten are, like, Samsung-related?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I kinda figured Samsung would be dominant. How many of the top ten are, like, Samsung-related?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, let's see... number one, then Jay Y. Lee at four. And a few others spread through the list, too. [overlaps] It's kinda wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, let's see... number one, then Jay Y. Lee at four. And a few others spread through the list, too. It's kinda wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #4 Jay Y. Lee $6.7 B 52 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] So, like, the chaebol families are still just, you know, absolutely crushing it then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, the chaebol families are still just, you know, absolutely crushing it then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! You see the same names pop up over and over. Lee, Kim, Chung, Koo... it’s, uh, very much a family affair with these huge conglomerates.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! You see the same names pop up over and over. Lee, Kim, Chung, Koo... it's, uh, very much a family affair with these huge conglomerates.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee ... #3 Kim Jung-ju ... #8 Mong-Koo Chung ... #13 Koo Kwang-mo

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like Hyundai, I bet. Is the Hyundai family on there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like Hyundai, I bet. Is the Hyundai family on there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, Mong-Koo Chung, Euisun Chung from Hyundai and Kia Motors are both, uh, pretty high up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, Mong-Koo Chung, Euisun Chung from Hyundai and Kia Motors are both, uh, pretty high up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #8 Mong-Koo Chung $3.2 B 82 Hyundai, Hyundai Motor #11 Euisun Chung $1.95 B 49 Hyundai, Hyundai Motor

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And what about outside of, like, the traditional manufacturing and tech? Any, um, surprises?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And what about outside of, like, the traditional manufacturing and tech? Any, um, surprises?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, there are a few. Kim Beom-su from Kakao, the online services giant, is actually pretty high at number five.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, there are a few. Kim Beom-su from Kakao, the online services giant, is actually pretty high at number five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #5 Kim Beom-su $5.2 B 54 online services, Kakao

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, KakaoTalk, right? That makes sense. It’s huge over there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, KakaoTalk, right? That makes sense. It's huge over there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And then you have some online gaming, like Nexon. Um, even some investment and pharmaceuticals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And then you have some online gaming, like Nexon. Um, even some investment and pharmaceuticals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #3 Kim Jung-ju $9.6 B 52 online games, Nexon ... #12 Michael Kim $1.9 B 56 Investment, MBK Partners ... #18 Lim Sung-ki $1.4 B 80 pharmaceuticals, Hanmi Holdings

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a bit of diversity, but still really driven by those massive, established family enterprises.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a bit of diversity, but still really driven by those massive, established family enterprises.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. It, uh, really gives you a sense of the economic landscape, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. It, uh, really gives you a sense of the economic landscape, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a great snapshot. Thanks for sharing that, A!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a great snapshot. Thanks for sharing that, A!
